inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 30 Gy in 10 fractions (3 Gy per fraction) over two weeks.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: capecitabine tablets will be given concurrently with radiotherapy in the dose 1400 mg/m2 orally, in two daily divided doses.

exclusion.criterion: Prior radiation therapy or prior palliative surgery to the painful site.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Impending fracture of the treatment site or planned surgical fixation of the bone.
